title: ep01_sc01_01
body:
Greetings Captain. Welcome aboard the Antelope, I am Personnel Officer Harris. I'll be assisting you with your staffing needs aboard the Antelope.

<<MusicFadeIn = "Retro-Sci-Fi-Planet_Looping">>

[[Wait...I get to pick my crew?|ep01_sc01_02a]]
[[Nice to meet you Mr. Harris.|ep01_sc01_02b]]

title: ep01_sc01_02a
body:
Wait...Do I get to hand pick my crew?


<<$meow = 5>>


[[Continue|ep01_sc01_03]]

title: ep01_sc01_02b
body:
Very nice to meet you Mr. Harris. I've never selected my own crew before, how does this process work?

<<$meow += 1>>

[[Continue|ep01_sc01_03]]

title: ep01_sc01_03
body:
This is a fairly simple process Captain. While you won't have the ability to hand pick EVERY single member of your crew, you will have have some say.

<<ep01 = "Onward">>
<<MusicFadeIn = "Factory-On-Mercury_Looping">>

[[Continue |ep01_sc01_04]]

title: ep01_sc01_04
body:
I will be presenting you with a few potential rosters of very talented service men and women. You can pick any of these pre-approved rosters for your crew. I assure you that these rosters were carefully compiled to ensure effective combat readiness.

[[That sounds great Mr. Harris. |ep01_sc01_05a]]
[[Oh deary...this will be tough. |ep01_sc01_05b]]

title: ep01_sc01_05a
body:
That sounds great Mr. Harris, let's see those rosters.

<<MusicFadeOut = "">>
<<ScreenQueue = "ConfirmScreen">>

title: ep01_sc01_05b
body:
Oh deary...this will be a tough decision but let's get this overwith Mr. Harris.

<<MusicFadeOut = "">>
